title: Benefits Of Getting Vaccinated
content:
COVID-19 vaccines protect your health
COVID-19 continues to cause millions of illnesses, hundreds of thousands of hospitalizations, and tens of thousands of deaths each year in the United States.
1
2
It was the 10th leading cause of death in 2023.
3
COVID-19 vaccines can help keep you from getting sick from COVID-19. If you do get COVID-19, vaccines can make the illness shorter
4
5
and less severe.
Stay up to date
Learn about the latest recommendations for the 2024-2025 COVID-19 vaccine.
